column3: “Super bomb sativa smoke, the smell and taste are absolutely phenomenal that holds true to its name and it smokes great to, a nice all around strain (sativa wise) def in my top 3 for daytime use”

“I bought this strain for only $7/gm at a local dispensary, thinking that anything at that low price might be great for making edibles.  After vaping a bowl, I changed my mind - I had just bought some excellent herb that I wanted to use for - everything!
Sweet and fruity, easy and smooth going in, this tasty herb gave me a pleasant, uplifted head high and energized me enough that I got through some chores and a lovely...”
“Smoking Hawaiian Punch is like taking a trip to Hawaii. It has the sweetest tropical aroma. Definetely a good anti-depressant!”

“I wanted to smoke a little weed to wind down for the night & get rid of my headache. little did I know that I could cure a headache while being simultaneously punched in the face by the mike tyson of marijuana. all I can do is lay in my bed thinking about how delicious ice water is and how much I love adult swim. I think I smoked too much but I am having a great time. This would be a great strain to pass around with ...”

“Didn't anticipate being THIS high when I broke into Hawaiian Punch for an early-afternoon bowl. My impression? Don't be fooled by its innocent fruity smell and bright, colorful buds; this one is closely related to Memphis Belle, so it'll punch you. And you won't even see it coming.”

“This strain like many of the other Hawaiian strains can be a little tricky to grow indoors. To see her full potential she needs a much longer flowerings than most of the popular Indica Hybrids around the shops these days. Not known for her indoor production, I've heard that she may do much better outdoors in much warmer climates. 
In 20+ years growing and breeding with this strain I've never seen a single seed in the...”

“This strain gave me a really good head high and made me focus. The smell and taste of these dense covered tricome nuggets are very sweet and fruity. The high lasted for about 2-3 hours great sativa. Looking forward to try this with the gas mask!!”

“My ex-husband had some and we smoked it last night. 

I found this strain to be VERY useful for me. I had mellowed out. It gave my mind a balance where I can stay focused, where as, in my typical day where I don’t smoke, my brain is almost always jumping from one task to the next. My body was relaxed. And of course it gives that feel good feeling.

I didn’t feel the anxiety, nervousness, paranoid that most people usu...”

“Beautiful bud and amazing high. I was blown away at how smooth it was as compared to most strains I've had similar to this. Gave me a quick head buzz that wasnt to intimidating but quite mellowing. Would definitely recommend and get this again.”
“A lovely high that keeps you talking for hours”

“Interesting that Hawaiian Punch is listed as a hybrid here, because my dispensary had it listed as the only 100% sativa I've ever seen. So, curious as to which is correct. Buds are very similar to the hawaiian haze I had early this year. Pretty loosely strung, light, deep green with long brown hairs. Smell is floral and tropical (not as much so as the Hawaiian Haze). The high is bit more clear headed, given the subtr...”

“Had a nice hearty sized bowl of this one for the first time.... wow! Just wow! It's one of those types of high where you are so high that you don't know you're high but then all of a sudden you realize just how high you are. Very enjoyable... fun weird effects like did I just think that out loud or in my head" followed by "did I just think that out loud too?" !!! Probably the weirdest thing was it was late at night ...”"
“Smells great, tastes great , highs amazing. Definitely recommend this one.”
“I actually really like this strain, not only does it have a nice smell, but a really good euphoric mellow high. perfect strain to kickback with friends smoke, N chill.”

“Being from The Big Island and knowing the creator of this tasty strain I think I can give a good honest rating. Hawaiian Punch delivers the flavor and creeping punch that this strain packs. Just what I look for at the end of a long day. My gf loves this strain when she gets a headache. Almost instant relief!”
“this is the best weed ever”

“This is the most dank of all.
Best weed you'll ever smoke, looking for a fun time? Look no further”
“Got me feeling absolutely amazing !”

“Being from The Big Island and knowing the creator of this tasty strain I think I can give a good honest rating. Hawaiian Punch delivers the flavor and creeping punch that this strain packs. Just what I look for at the end of a long day. My gf loves this strain when she gets a headache. Almost instant relief!”
“this is the best weed ever”
“I actually really like this strain, not only does it have a nice smell, but a really good euphoric mellow high. perfect strain to kickback with friends smoke, N chill.”

“Delicious, sweet, tropical smell and flavor reminiscent of the red Hawaiian Punch we all drank as kids. It literally tastes and smells like a tropical treat. Uplifting yet stoney high that comes on quick and strong, like catching the perfect wave. I really enjoyed this sweet, flavorful strain. I wish it would come around more often!”

“Great sativa, very useful for daytime activities. Highly recommended for a good weekend Saturday, Sunday afternoon relaxation. Very tropical, sweet and citrusy aroma and flavor, like the punch drink itself.”
“This one is pretty solid. If u smoke too much of this, might give u a black eye lol”
“I found this strain to be exactly as described.  Nice high, smooth burn, long lasting buzz. I found it to be a body and head high.”
“This one is pretty solid. If u smoke too much of this, might give u a black eye lol”

“Makes you start talking, and when you do you don’t stop. It honestly helped relieve stress/tension in my neck too. 

Makes you feel very euphoric.”

“Great sativa, very useful for daytime activities. Highly recommended for a good weekend Saturday, Sunday afternoon relaxation. Very tropical, sweet and citrusy aroma and flavor, like the punch drink itself.”
“Love this strain... Great taste and amazing High... The flowers where amazing. If you can try some you wont be disappointed. We have some Hawaiian Punch Wax. Come try it out...”
“I got this at a dispensary in Seattle. Probably my new favorite. Relaxed, happy. Very nice taste and feeling.”

“Just smoked a bowl out of clean glass and was blown away by the flavor and high!  Smelled wonderful, tropical fruity/citrus sweet, but didn't expect it on the tongue too!  Nice purple hints on the crystal covered buds gave it a unique bag appeal as well...a solid A”
“great high :)”

“Awesome package . Shipped fresh . Seeds germinated fast . Plants looks very healthy . Medium height . Good basement height. Purple stems if turn temp low at night . Clones produce quick . Veg seemed average time . Nice well rounded plant if trimmed right .”
“it's soooooooooo amazing!! it smells so sweet and delicious & it leaves you feeling A-1. 100000% recommend”

“This strain I picked up from 7 Highway in tacoma. when i got my hands on this one, i could already smell it through the bag. a nice and even aroma with a smooth flavor to it. i grough up a small piece and loaded it into my pipe. the firsr hit was heavy and punchy. i didnt feel the effects at first, but when i sat there for a moment, the calmness rolled over me like a wave. i found a nice, productive feel from this, w...”

“This is one nice strain–it relieves a lot of stress and loosen up the body. I vaporized it, and the taste was fantastic. The euphoria lasted for quite a while–not one moment of paranoia–and was really good for a middle of the day walk in the park with the dog. Really crisp. A+”
“This is strong pot. Hits with punch”
“Great smoke, delicious flavor, had a horrible headache before smoking and within 10mins the headache was gone and that's a first for me. Quite potent but still a very calm high.”

“The description is a little overboard, but a very good strain. It has a fulfilling high, good head-rush, and it allows the mind to flow. Its a good strain to smoke before doing something active or thought provoking.”
“Great head and body high”
“Boom shockalcka shit is fire”
“Super potent good taste slow creeping high”

“very good and how my dad would say it TUFF" flower it can come out smelling very sweet and tropical even if you grow it outside and dont take care of it that well and it won't just smell and look good but HIT good too. if your a sativa lover your like this one. ppl thinks it's the Haze strain sometimes but it's not.”"
“Mmmmmmmm the smell and taste is soo good.”
“This ish is so fire. If you find this at your place. Do not hesitate.”

“Loved it! Sweet and fruity. Love the smell and the red color of the bud. Not recommended for lightweights. Smoked a large bowl and got punch in the face....afterwards lovely. No pain, chilled, clarity and laughing. No side effects. Top 5”
“Bomb with a berry fusion Dutch”
“Fruity and tart, just like the name implies. A great physical painkiller and almost more effective than a cup of coffee first thing in the morning”
“Good stuff! Some of my fav”

“don't know what a hawaiian punch is? back in the day when operation green harvest was eradicating all the pakalolo in the islands,we use to call it the crip..no fancy names like today..the real hawaiian weed would hit yiur nervous system and really get you rip,that is the real hawaiian stuff..JMHO..”
“not to happy with the low high it gave me. has great taste and great smell just not to satisfied”
“energetic buzz but mind the dosage; this one can tilt into anxiety as it doesn't have a happy or euphoric element to the high”
“energetic buzz but mind the dosage; this one can tilt into anxiety as it doesn't have a happy or euphoric element to the high.”
“I really want to try this strain”
